channel.title: Help!
channel.description: how do i make it so there is only like 2 folders and run when u open my client folder. i have tried making a new folder and putting everything but run in but when i try to run the client it gets errors =o

item.title: Help!
item.dc:creator: @Trent1 Trent!!
item.description:
@Trent1 wrote:

easy!!

ctrl + click which files/folders you want hidden,
when they are selected right click and go to properties.
then i think you go to attributes, click hidden, then apply and hit OK
then they will be hidden

it’s fool proof.
if you have any further trouble PM me.

Read full topic
